attributes.action: introduce laws to ensure that for every one house owned by a british ex-pat which is destroyed by the Spanish authorities THREE houses owned by Spaniards living in this country are destroyed.  This policy should continue until the Spanish authorities stop persecuting British ex-pats who have funded the economy of Spain for decades.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time that some of the taxpayer pounds we are sending to foreign parts to help develop improved terrorist training colleges were diverted to help some of our own people to stop them being terrorised by our European Union partners.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
